text: atarkavar (avvanavarkalai nokki) ‘‘niccayamaka atil luttum irukkirare!'' Enru kurinar. Atarkavarkal ‘‘atil iruppavarkal yar enpatai nankal nankarivom. Avaraiyum avarutaiya kutumpattaraiyum niccayamaka nankal patukattuk kolvom. Avarutaiya manaivi (avarutan cellatu alintu pokakkutiya avvurarutan) tanki (avarkalutan avalum alintu) vituval'' enru kurinarkal
